00019 #ifndef TLM_REQ_RSP_CHANNELS
00020 #define TLM_REQ_RSP_CHANNELS

00022 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_adapters/tlm_adapters.h"
00023 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_fifo/tlm_fifo.h"

00026 template < typename REQ , typename RSP ,
00027            typename REQ_CHANNEL = tlm_fifo<REQ> , 
00028            typename RSP_CHANNEL = tlm_fifo<RSP> >
00029 
00030 class tlm_req_rsp_channel : public sc_module
00031 {
00032 public:
00033   // uni-directional slave interface
00034 
00035   sc_export< tlm_fifo_get_if< REQ > > get_request_export;
00036   sc_export< tlm_fifo_put_if< RSP > > put_response_export;
00037 
00038   // uni-directional master interface
00039 
00040   sc_export< tlm_fifo_put_if< REQ > > put_request_export;
00041   sc_export< tlm_fifo_get_if< RSP > > get_response_export;
00042 
00043   // master / slave interfaces
00044 
00045   sc_export< tlm_master_if< REQ , RSP > > master_export;
00046   sc_export< tlm_slave_if< REQ , RSP > > slave_export;
00047 
00048 
00049   tlm_req_rsp_channel( int req_size = 1 , int rsp_size = 1 ) :
00050     sc_module( sc_module_name( sc_gen_unique_name("tlm_req_rsp_channel") ) ) ,
00051     request_fifo( req_size ) ,
00052     response_fifo( rsp_size ) ,
00053     master( request_fifo , response_fifo ) , 
00054     slave( request_fifo , response_fifo )
00055   {
00056 
00057     bind_exports();
00058     
00059   }
00060 
00061   tlm_req_rsp_channel( sc_module_name module_name ,
00062                        int req_size = 1 , int rsp_size = 1 ) :
00063     sc_module( module_name  ) , 
00064     request_fifo( req_size ) ,
00065     response_fifo( rsp_size ) ,
00066     master( request_fifo , response_fifo ) , 
00067     slave( request_fifo , response_fifo )
00068   {
00069 
00070     bind_exports();
00071     
00072   }
00073 
00074 private:
00075   void bind_exports() {
00076 
00077     put_request_export( request_fifo );
00078     get_request_export( request_fifo );
00079     
00080     put_response_export( response_fifo );
00081     get_response_export( response_fifo );
00082 
00083     master_export( master );
00084     slave_export( slave );
00085 
00086   }
00087 
00088 protected:
00089   REQ_CHANNEL request_fifo;
00090   RSP_CHANNEL response_fifo;
00091 
00092   tlm_master_imp< REQ , RSP > master;
00093   tlm_slave_imp< REQ , RSP > slave;
00094 };
00095 
00096 template < typename REQ , typename RSP ,
00097            typename REQ_CHANNEL = tlm_fifo<REQ> , 
00098            typename RSP_CHANNEL = tlm_fifo<RSP> >
00099 class tlm_transport_channel : public sc_module
00100 {
00101 public:
00102 
00103   // master transport interface
00104 
00105   sc_export< tlm_transport_if< REQ , RSP > > target_export;
00106 
00107   // slave interfaces
00108 
00109   sc_export< tlm_fifo_get_if< REQ > > get_request_export;
00110   sc_export< tlm_fifo_put_if< RSP > > put_response_export;
00111 
00112   sc_export< tlm_slave_if< REQ , RSP > > slave_export;
00113 
00114   tlm_transport_channel() :
00115     sc_module( sc_module_name( sc_gen_unique_name("transport_channel" ) ) ) ,
00116     target_export("target_export") ,
00117     req_rsp( "req_rsp" , 1 , 1 ) ,
00118     t2m("ts2m")
00119   {
00120     do_binding();
00121   }
00122 
00123   tlm_transport_channel( sc_module_name nm ) :
00124     sc_module( nm ) ,
00125     target_export("target_export") ,
00126     req_rsp( "req_rsp" , 1 , 1 ) ,
00127     t2m("tsm" )
00128   {
00129     do_binding();
00130   }
00131 
00132 private:
00133   void do_binding() {
00134 
00135     target_export( t2m.target_export );
00136 
00137     t2m.master_port( req_rsp.master_export );
00138 
00139     get_request_export( req_rsp.get_request_export );
00140     put_response_export( req_rsp.put_response_export );
00141     slave_export( req_rsp.slave_export );
00142 
00143   }
00144 
00145   tlm_req_rsp_channel< REQ , RSP , REQ_CHANNEL , RSP_CHANNEL > req_rsp;
00146   tlm_transport_to_master< REQ , RSP > t2m;
00147 
00148 };
